website_summaries.verdict: Creamy yet crunchy bars, with whole pieces of nuts and delicious dark chocolate.
pros: Each bar packs 12 grams of protein
Gluten-free, non-GMO, kosher, with a low glycemic index and low sodium
Sure to be a hit in any household
cons: Chocolate can melt in warmer climates or months
Some find them too gooey to handle cleanly while eating

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: Great pick me up after swimming or for that mid-afternoon slump! This is the 1.76oz bar.. 250 calories.. 12 g protein! Most stores only carry the smaller Kind bar, This one seems much more satisfying. I have been following the Metabolic research diet but cannot eat many of their products bcuz they have soy in them and I am allergic to soy.. my reaction to soy is hunger🙁. The Kind bars also have soy but it doesn’t make me hungry. Anyway, it seems to work with me and I’ve lost 39#’s in the last 18 months!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Taste and 12 grams protein
customer_reviews.text: What I like: The great taste and the 12 grams of protein in the Kind Protein Bars, Double Dark Chocolate Nut, Gluten Free Bar makes it a winner in my book. The fact that it is gluten free is a plus as is the Dark Chocolate and nuts. What I don't like: I try to keep or limit sugar and soy from my diet and this bar has both, but find that so hard to do. I will make an exception for this delicious ready to transport and eat treat.
customer_reviews.author: Val M

customer_reviews.title: There are only 20 bars and not 30 in this product.
customer_reviews.text: The number of bars in this product is incorrect. Amazon was wonderful in providing a replacement, but it also only had 20 bars instead of 30.
customer_reviews.author: R Korb

customer_reviews.title: Arrive in fragments
customer_reviews.text: Lately these protein bars have been arriving in broken bits, which is annoying. I don't know if they drop-kick them in the warehouse or what, but I open the wrapping on one and a large chunk of it leaps onto the floor. The bars themselves are great, but a bit frangible.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Downey Broxon

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy, chewy peanuty taste
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best protein bars I've tasted. They have great taste without any of that weird protein taste that most protein bars have. This bar does get some of its protein from nuts, which is why it tastes so good and the calories are so high, but not all of the protein comes from the nuts. They have a PB coating only on the bottom and drizzles on the top. I wish they'd make it Subscribe and Save, because I will be getting them often. You should at least try them. They come in different flavors, if you don't want Peanut Butter.
customer_reviews.author: E W Puddle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice filling breakfast. I wish it was less salty.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best Kind bar I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Best Kind bar I've ever tried! Seriously so yummy! Has a great crunch to it. It did a arrive with the chocolate a bit melted but I live in Houston, Texas so its self explanatory. Perhaps if I ordered through Prime Pantry it would have been on a chilled truck or something; I don't know how that works. I put the bars in the fridge for about an hour then room temperature. They are great and will defiantly re order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Exhorbitantly overpriced now. Price jumped 50% in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I liked these but when I signed up for a subscription, they were less than $1.50 a bar. Now (as of this post) they're over $2 each! Holy cow was I shocked to realize I was paying so much. You can get MUCH better protein bars if you're willing to pay that. These are more like relatively healthy snack bars than actual protein bars from which I would expect about 20g+. PAY ATTN to your subscriptions! Don't get apathetic like I did. We should get a warning with any price hikes. We agree to a subscription based on a certain price!
customer_reviews.author: Dalebert Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Finally - A Decent Low Carb Bar with no Tree Nuts
customer_reviews.text: I need to control my carb intake as much as possible being a Type II diabetic - but I'm also allergic to Tree Nuts which means there are very few lo-carb bars out there I can eat. I love, love, love peanuts in all their forms and this bar is for peanut lovers like me (peanuts are a legume, not a tree nut). Tasty, filling and loaded with peanuts. I've been ordering these things by the case. KIND makes a good product and I wish I could eat their other bars but at least they made one with out nuts which I really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: SirBill94

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious even for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: I started buying Kind brand when i was eliminating gluten from my diet. Then i discovered these delicious bars. I love them. I carry several with me always. I am diabetic and if I have low sugar I eat one of these after Tabilizing. A few pluses-non gmo. Low glycemic index.sustainable forestry initiative. And did I say delicious? Not vegan, contains some milk powder. Did I say delicious. Oh, yeah I did. .
customer_reviews.author: n shish

customer_reviews.title: Received only 20 bars, not 30
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a box of four packages of 5 bars each, total only 20 bars, not 30. What a rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: greenhelp9

customer_reviews.title: My Fav Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of protein bars and by far this one is my favorite. I first purchased one of these from a Pharmacy store for almost $4. So glad I did. I travel for a living and there are times its difficult to stop for a meal. Carrying a couple of protein bars in my bag is a plus. If you've ever had a "Payday" candy bar, this KIND bar reminds me of a Payday candy bar without all the bad stuff your body doesn't need. I like that there isn't an after taste. I'd definitely recommend the Crunchy Peanut Butter KIND bar.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Only 20 bars!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a container holding 4 x 5-bar boxes. Amazon has issued a replacement, but listing is incorrect. Amazon was wonderful in providing a replacement, but it also only had 20 bars instead of 30.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This is really good product for people who starts their workout.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this product contains more fat than other protein bar products. But I am pretty sure this product is better than any other products. KIND protein bars have more nutrition such as vitamin, iron and etc than other protein bar products have. That is, it is a well-balanced product. So it is better to balance our diet by consuming fruits and vegetables with it. And because of this balance, especially for me who have a problem with liver, KIND bar is much better to consume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 20 bars.
customer_reviews.text: I am annoyed because I have always received a box of 30 bars and this was 4 smaller boxes of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lamberth

customer_reviews.title: Great Source of Protein
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars because they are a great source of protein. I have to eat several small meals a day, and one of these bars counts as one of those meals. They are very convenient to carry in my purse or bag and very flavorful. I, also, find that they are very filling and keep me satisfied until it is time for my next meal. I would highly recommend these to anyone but especially to those who need to have a pick-me-up during the day. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Hard as rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Only buy these if you plan to eat them alone and have no teeth/jaw issues!! While the flavor is okay, they are so hard, it's difficult to break off a bite, and a downright workout to chew it......oh, and the noise - as I said, plan to eat these things alone. Crunchy?? Ha!! These bars are like rocks!! Not sure I would buy them again, and I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Roget

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in taste
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars when I buy them at the store but the bars that I received do not taste the same and are old & stale.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of kind bars out of convenience. When I need a salty sugary snack I reach for a kind bar. This one is my favorite flavor. They are a little bit larger than the other bars as well. These are so much better than candy bars because there are no GMO’s and also the glycemic index is ok.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Kind bars a lot for their taste as well as the attention to a low glycemic index. These high protein ones are an added bonus as a meal replacement on the road. Amazon has a better selection of Kind bar options than I can find locally, and the prices are better, too.
customer_reviews.author: CAShopR

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste but Chocolate Melts Easily
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste great, but the chocolate in them melts very quickly. You can start to see it melt while you're eating the bar, just from holding it in the wrapper. You definitely don't want to take these outside in the summer/sun. I tried to eat one while driving my car and it was not fun trying to get melted chocolate off my fingers. Overall, the simplicity of the bars, good taste, and the fact that they keep me feeling full for longer overpower my annoyance with the melting chocolate so I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Favorite meals on the road, good protein
customer_reviews.text: I live on Kind protein bars. My nutritionist told me to get more protein as part of improving my diet and recommended these in particular for packing on all my work travel. I've lost 60 lbs this year so the advice was good! I always have these in my purse or suitcase and they often sub for breakfast or lunch when I'm on the rad. 2x as much protein as reg kind bars. peanut butter crunch & salted caramel nut are my faves.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in DC

customer_reviews.title: Almond Butter Dark Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today after I got home. At first, I was worried what if i don't like it, I ordered Almond Butter Dark Chocolate which i really liked it and it is not heavy on my stomach or you can feel it as I experienced with other products. Honestly speaking it is delicious and I am going to add it to my list.
customer_reviews.author: iamAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so darn good. That's all you need to know if you love dark chocolate & are hoping for a healthier version of a dark chocolate candy bar. I really hope these are as healthy as I infer from the wrapper! LoL!
customer_reviews.author: Chaturunga

customer_reviews.title: Chewy, fresh, lots of nuts
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from an illness during which I lost a significant amount of weight and am trying to regain my energy. This is the best protein bar I’ve tried. It does not have the chalky, sawdust texture that are sometimes found in other protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Healthier and Tastier Than Most Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a dozen different kinds of protein bars, all rated high for nutrition, and this is one of the bars that my grandson liked the best. Doesn't have an overwhelming date texture and sweetness like other bars and satisfies your hunger. I bought this on sale from Amazon and then found them on sale for $1 a bar at a local grocer.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Stale, Hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.text: Buy these regularly from numerous grocery stores. Always slightly crunchy & delicious. Decided to buy off Amazon in bulk for convenience. Literally thought I was going to chip a tooth on the 1st one I ate. It was hard as a rock. Tried another one & same thing. Felt remaining bars through package and had a hard time breaking them in half. ONLY ONE out of twelve had some kind of give and was edible. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Deakin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy alternative to candy bars and most other protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious, with just the right amount of dark chocolate and nuts. Good source of protein, with a moderate amount of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: OnTheEdge

customer_reviews.title: Okay But Tasted Old
customer_reviews.text: They product was okay for they tasted old, because of that I won't be buying them again. It's like they had been laying around for awhile. I've had these bars before and they are a great protein bar, maybe Amazon needs to look at the product to see how long they've had them before shipping them out. That's why I gave it a low rating.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJohn

customer_reviews.title: Protein Bars for the Win!
customer_reviews.text: I like switching between these protein bars and the regular KIND bars-- they're awesome for breakfast, snack time, breaks during school, etc. I also like how the bars aren't overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany VB

customer_reviews.title: Old hard Kind bars disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Although the product was dated May, it was old, dried out and disappointing. These products are usually 5 star however occasionally they arrive with a date that is acceptable but, ingredients and overall condition dry ,hard, old tasting and though edible hardly worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: northcarolinian

customer_reviews.title: Not what they should taste like.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these at the grocery store so I know what they are supposed to taste like. This order tasted so stale I even checked the expiration date. It was December 2019 but tasted like it was expired. Bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Jill J.

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with stale nuts
customer_reviews.text: These bars are stale, even though exp date is still 3 months off. I’d like to return my unopened package but it says can’t be returned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein bar!! These are really good, do NOT taste like the typical protein bar and while they do have a higher sugar and fat content it is still worth it and sooooo yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: Staze Craze

customer_reviews.title: Not safe while pregnant or breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware these bars contain chicory root fiber which is not safe to consume while pregnant. Im 5 months pregnant I ate one of these bars and realized they have chicory root fiber which can cause uterine contractions and is generally considered unsafe during pregnancy or breastfeeding. So i immediately tossed them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: really good nut bar
customer_reviews.text: Use it with Milk for a very high protein snack or meal replacement. Full of nuts (mostly almonds) and chocolate. I really like them, but they are more expensive than the regular peanut butter chocolate protein bars, but bigger too.
customer_reviews.author: RK42

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad to be able to obtain them here
customer_reviews.text: The stores near where I live don't seem to carry this product. I am so glad to be able to obtain them here. This product is delicious and contains 12 grams of protein. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Beth Silcox

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love these but they were a kinda stale and that ruined the enjoyment of them. I think I'll stick to buying them locally.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: More delicious than you can imagine
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my husband and I fell in love with these bars! We both love peanut butter and my husband loves peanut brittle and these taste similar to that! The protein is a bonus, as far as I am concerned! Excuse me, have to go buy more. . .
customer_reviews.author: bdbear

customer_reviews.title: They taste great and are very filling
customer_reviews.text: I love kind bars. Especially this flavor. They are very filling and are filled with healthy fats and proteins. I eat a bar for breakfast and one for lunch. It keeps me feel throughout the day and helps me manage my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Fool for Christ

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, great texture & flavor
customer_reviews.text: These truly may be the perfect snack/protein bar. They're crunchy and chewy at the same time. They're both salty and slightly sweet. The chocolate doesn't seem to get melty when it's warm. And the protein is about as natural as it comes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the BEST protein bar i've ever had!!!! I could eat a whole box of these in one sitting. Can't wait to try the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjarella

customer_reviews.title: Decent but strange texture
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these were fresh or not but for some reason the peanut butter upset my stomach and it normally doesn’t do that with these bars. Price was similar to the going rate for these.
customer_reviews.author: ZZDrummin88

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as one of those things that’s supposed to be good for you, and ended up thinking of them as treats. I don’t know how long they stay fresh, but there are a lot in the box. The cost is so much more reasonable purchased this way even though the initial price can seem like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Peanuts in a bar.
customer_reviews.text: If you like peanuts, you'll enjoy this bar. That is the predominate taste and texture. I was a bit disappointed because I prefer a "chewer" texture as opposed to crunchy. If you like chewy, try Aldi's peanut protein bars(cheaper, too.)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Klekner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack after working out
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd give these a try but had been buying individually at the store. The are really good and healthy but was even more excited to be able to buy them in bulk from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: The new 25% bigger bars aren't as good
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite go-to breakfast protein bar but when they went to the bigger/thicker bar, they just aren't as good. Wish they would've kept the original.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best tasting protein bar I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best tasting protein bar I have ever had. None of that chalkiness you get from most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The protein bars have a layer of peanut butter at the bottom so when my product arrived I opened one package and the peanut butter had melted and had stuck to the wrapper. The taste was not as good as when I would purchase it at the store. Unfortunately, the store no longer carries this type of protein bar so that was my reason for going through Amazon but was not satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars and gluten free
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting protein bars out there. The fact that you can read the ingredients that you know says a lot about Kind. I hope they come up with more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: ena

customer_reviews.title: Good peanut butter taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the peanut butter taste and the ingredients. I take these when I travel a lot because I am gluten free. But, they are just too crunchy and messy when you bite into them. My husband refuses to eat them for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: yummy bar !
customer_reviews.text: great protein . doesn't leave me bloated or give me gas. tastes really good. sometimes my gums hurt if i eat too many in a week though. it's a very hard bar with large chunks of nuts. but soooooo delicious !
customer_reviews.author: scott tompkins

customer_reviews.title: My go-to bars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. Great flavor combination, good mix of nuts, healthy fats and proteins, perfect afternoon snack. I can't eat a lot of other protein bars because of their sugar content, but these bars taste better than them anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Justin A Coogle

customer_reviews.title: ease of purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are difficult to find in the store, but this is my favorite flavor. They make a great snack between lunch and dinner. This flavor is a little sweet and also salty.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L

customer_reviews.title: Great protein source
customer_reviews.text: I eat the heck out of these. My nutritionist told me I needed more protein (trying to lose weight and so far have dropped 56 lbs) so I carry these with me when I travel for work or just when things get busy in case I don't have time to stop for lunch at work. Taste Great!
customer_reviews.author: AJ in DC

customer_reviews.title: Something to buy if you like peanuts
customer_reviews.text: If you like peanuts this is a great granola bar. I have a subscription for this and it is a good change from eating trail mix
customer_reviews.author: La louve

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my 92 yr. old step-dad & ship them to him. He loves them and asked me to order new ones when he finished them. A good snack for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cyd K.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and packed with nutrients.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bars for on the go or whenever. Packed with nutrition. The company should consider a paper wrap for earth sustainability.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with these kind bars
customer_reviews.text: I order kind bars all the time. This vendors box was missing one bar and the bars taste foul. Bad aftertaste and upsets my stomach. Terrible total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: jayson pascucci

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy - I love these bars.  But they had all soured.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. But they had all soured. The warehousing was bad. I am very angry. The box date is 21 October 2020.. but the bars are completely spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Husband Loves these bars but pricey no matter where you purchase them, they changed the name so they were hard to find again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that Kind bars that boast of being healthy and good for you, gluten free, no GMO's now added soy protein isolate in this bar. If it were not for that and it being listed as the third ingredient, I would order it again. It makes me sad and skeptical. I hope Kind will reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Protein bar with Natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I already consume a lot of whey protein. So, I wanted something different and this fills in that protein gap in my diet. Perfect for those who want a low sugar, no artificial sweeteners, no whey protein bar. I tried all the flavors- Double chocolate is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Nithin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big peanut butter person, and these kind bars are the bomb. I like that they have extra protein, and all the ingredients are natural. They’re good too in case you’re craving something sweet. Perfect substitute for a candy bars
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: These are not nut bars, they are peanut bars
customer_reviews.text: I can eat nuts, but not peanuts, which are legumes, not actually nuts. I guess i should have zoomed in on the ingredients, so it's my fault, but i ended up throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein bar.
customer_reviews.text: Good treat. I use these to get some energy at breakfast time. I don't replace a meal with them. They are part of breakfast some days.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Borsay

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one at a convenience store and I liked them. I am allergic to chocolate and detests coconut. These are not the same. I wont say stale but they either have sat too long or in a place where they dried out.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I always have at least one in my purse
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars when I haven't had time or inclination to eat properly. I am diabetic and I get a boost of energy without a load of sugar. I always have at least one in my purse and when I travel I have several in my carry on. They are quick, easy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: J K H

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I dislike chocolate and it’s hard to get a good protein bar without it. This it great tasting, good for lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very good bars. I'll buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far these are the best of the many bars I've tried. Not overly sweetened. Taste like the ingredients that they are made of.
customer_reviews.author: piano

customer_reviews.title: YUM.
customer_reviews.text: I eat these at least 3 times a week. I'm allergic to wheat and eggs, and these DELICIOUS bars are perfect for me to grab a quick, healthy, protein-rich and allergy-friendly (for me) snack or on-the-go breakfast. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: H. Easom

customer_reviews.title: Truly Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: To know that I'm eating something with such great nutritional value and tastes so good is great!!! LOVE these bars!! Not too sweet like some kind bars are.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious and not too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: These health bars are delicious and not too sweet. Remember to eat these in place of a meal or snack. Otherwise, you will gain weight if eating these as extras throughout your day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: best bar
customer_reviews.text: love the peanut butter and since HEB stopped carrying their own brand at 1.00 apiece this will be the next choice
customer_reviews.author: cayC

customer_reviews.title: Like the protein
customer_reviews.text: So this tastes good and has the protein in it so I like it for skipping breakfast and maybe it’s better than the usual breakfast stuff that’s usually bread and processed pork.
customer_reviews.author: ess

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are good. I prefer the bars with dark chocolate. If you love caramel this bar is for you. They are full of nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good..But do NOT order as they come all melted
customer_reviews.text: I eat one almost everyday..BUT, since they came via UPS, the kind Bars and another item came totally melted. And I think I paid the extra delivery charge for one of them. Definitely NOT happy about receiving melted merchandise
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Born

customer_reviews.title: Great snack or for part of lunch
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kind Protein Bars that are 12gr of protein. I always keep some on hand but they have been harder to find in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: BEST SNACK BAR EVER
customer_reviews.text: I always carry a few of these bars in my purse to eat as a snack throughout my busy day. These are flavorful, nutritious and satisfy my appetite. These have become a staple in my kitchen pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: You pay for 30 but get 20!
customer_reviews.text: Overpaying through Amazon is not something I expected to do - nor being lied to by Amazon! Do not order this unless you want to over pay - and check all your Amazon orders because this may not be the only time they are deceiving a customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Finley

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I like a Kind Bar for a mid-day snack. However, the Caramel Bar was dry and had little taste. That included the dry caramel slathered on the back of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Bethie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious KIND bar. I read about these in a magazine and decided to try them.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamonsimian

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein Bar Definitely Crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly. I had never tried this bar before this shipment. Healthy but very crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaufhold

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my favorites! It’s clean and perfect for my busy schedule. It makes me meal prep so easy because I know I am eating healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Best snack on the go.. keep in vehicles in case hungry
customer_reviews.text: Keep in work truck on the job and im hungry.. stop eating fast food, lower sugar than cliff bars even dropped couple pounds..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: $2 a bar is way too much, but I purchased it to give it a try and it's a great flavor. I just need to see the price come down before I purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: Best-tasting protein "granola" bars around!
customer_reviews.text: Dark chocolate and lots of nuts... what more can you ask for? These are definitely my favorite...
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not worth the cost but delicious anyway. Eating protein helps subdue hunger pains when trying to lose weight and that's why I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good protein/calorie ratio
customer_reviews.text: The kids and I like these a lot. Good ratio of protein to calories. The price is reasonable when buying in this quantity.
customer_reviews.author: "illinokie"

customer_reviews.title: Sticky to the teeth
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. A bit sticky. Don't make the mistake of leaving the bar in the car during a warm day and then opening it (very gooey mess). Would recommend if you like the peanut butter taste.
customer_reviews.author: Syrena

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars for great bulk value
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great value. Save money on purchasing these in bulk from Amazon than our local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Protein Kick!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to UP my protein intake after a couple of major orthopedic surgeries. This was a delicious way to do that! These bars were fresh and so good!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good on the go snacj
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, tasty but pretty crunchy and not very chewy. Decent amount of protein but also high in sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Better tasting than other protein bars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the crunch, maybe it's something else, but I found these to be quite tasty and satisfying for a protein bar. I only wish they were a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ubuntu

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I eat one of these KIND bars when I get home from work and don't want to cook for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable quick energy
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger bars than local retailers stock locally. Convenient to carry while cycling or hiking. Taste bertter than some other brands have tried.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: My favourite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a natural protein bar without a chewy texture like think thin/rxbars that has no artificial sweeteners. This has a decent amount of protein-12g and more importantly tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nithin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm love peanut butter anyway, but these are amazing. They're like a healthy payday bar. Wholesome ingredients make wholesome food. I always keep these in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite go-to snack
customer_reviews.text: This a great guilt-free snack/ meal replacement when you're on the go or just don't have time for a sit down meal. And it tastes pretty good too
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Chewy protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Very chewy, gets stuck in my teeth. I do like that it has 12 grams of protein. Average taste.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

product_meta.title: KIND Protein Bars, Dark Chocolate Nut, Gluten Free, 12g Protein,1.76 Ounce, 12 count
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Double Dark Chocolate Nut| Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)Why settle for a protein bar that doesn’t taste good? Meet KIND Protein - made with premium whole ingredients and a creamy, crunchy texture, this bar is a delicious blend of ingredients that packs 12g of protein for a snack that’s satisfying and delicious.
feature_bullets: Made with rich dark chocolate and crunchy whole nuts, this bar's also a good source of protein - what's not to love?
Good source of protein - 12g per bar
Gluten free, No Genetically Modified Ingredients, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher
Low glycemic index, low sodium, good source of fiber

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
